name: The obnoxious thought machine - jam edition
name_original: The obnoxious thought machine - jam edition
description:
Thought machines are a curious contraption, they can manifest their wishes to reality.

However, they have a tendency to loose control of this capability, becoming rather... obnoxious.

Those unfit for society get cast away to a deserted archipelago, and forced to use masks to filter out their thoughts. Some remain friendly, but others...

Will you survive, or will you succumb to your obnoxious thoughts?

Whatever you do, do not take off the mask.

----------------------------------------------------------

made in 5 weeks for the HPS1 game jam 2022.

If you enjoyed it, consider following me on twitter https://twitter.com/lupusinfabula22
